It’s unfathomable that this needs to be said, but airlines must give customers their money back for canceled flights—not a travel voucher. 
https://twitter.com/USATODAY/status/1260673168689238018 QT @USATODAY Senators have proposed legislation that would require airlines to offer refunds to all passengers — even those who cancel their own trips. https://www.usatoday.com/story/travel/airline-news/2020/05/13/coronavirus-refunds-senate-tells-airlines-give-back-10-billion-fliers/5182455002/

RT @AmbJohnBolton It's foolish for the US to solely rely on China for critical components of electronics & defense projects that use rare earth metals.  These are key strategic resources.  I support @tedcruz & his legislation to shift US sources away from China https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2020-05-12/cruz-seeks-to-end-u-s-dependence-on-china-for-rare-earth-metals

Communities of color have been hardest hit by COVID-19 & face structural inequalities for accessing relief. I want the IG to investigate how the PPP is favoring larger & wealthier customers, leaving out underserved communities that need help the most. https://www.bostonglobe.com/2020/04/24/business/warren-calls-investigation-small-business-loan-program-saying-banks-were-playing-favorites/

At this week's Senate hearing, Trump administration officials repeatedly evaded my simple question. 

So I am once again asking: @SecAzar, when a COVID-19 vaccine is approved, will it be made available to everyone in America without cost? http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EYAzF4vXQAABsoh.jpg

➡️ Drop the #ACA lawsuit 
➡️ Support the special enrollment period
➡️ Expand Medicaid https://twitter.com/teampelosi/status/1261084311798808582 QT @TeamPelosi 📺WATCH📺 Republican Sen. Cornyn encourages people to sign up for the Affordable Care Act!

After years of sabotage, it's time for Republicans to support the special enrollment period, drop their reckless ACA lawsuit that threatens our health care and expand Medicaid. http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1261083313663553537/pu/img/eizbT9dFwSM-p0RO.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1261083313663553537/pu/vid/480x270/XzwxURnH9w5ii-Zv.mp4?tag=10

Sen. Rubio and @SenAmyKlobuchar requested @CDCgov to evaluate a possible increased risk of stroke among younger and middle-aged Americans who are, or previously were, infected with #coronavirus.

https://www.rubio.senate.gov/public/index.cfm?p=Press-Releases&id=E0919A0F-7A12-4530-9C10-37B038F176D1
It’s unconscionable that Trump and Republicans continue to support a lawsuit to dismantle the Affordable Care Act. Yet that’s exactly what they’re doing. In the middle of a pandemic.

Families of first responders who tragically lost their lives to #COVID19 must get the benefits they deserve. Today the Senate passed our bill that ensures this—I won’t stop until it becomes law & our heroes know we have their backs as they have ours. https://www.booker.senate.gov/news/press/senate-passes-booker-grassley-bipartisan-bill-helping-families-of-first-responders-lost-to-covid

RT @Alyssa_Milano US can make voting safer during the pandemic. Don't let Republicans stop it. 

My latest op-ed for @CNN calling for ways to safeguard the 2020 election. 

PLEASE read. PLEASE share.  https://www.cnn.com/2020/05/14/opinions/safer-voting-during-pandemic-mail-in-ballots-milano/index.html

Senators @MazieHirono, @SenDuckworth & I asked @USCCRgov to issue guidance to federal agencies on preventing COVID-related harassment & attacks against people of Asian descent. I'm glad to see they've done it. https://www.nbcnews.com/news/asian-america/civil-rights-commission-agrees-senate-democrats-call-action-against-anti-n1207136

Thirteen sailors recently returned to @NASPCOLA after thirty days in #NewYorkCity caring for #COVID19 patients aboard the USNS Comfort. We are proud of these #Florida sailors for their service amidst the #coronavirus outbreak.

https://www.defense.gov/Explore/Features/Story/Article/2184660/pensacola-sailors-return-from-covid-19-efforts-in-new-york/

The right to vote is sacred and every American should be able to exercise it safely.

We need to fully fund the @USPS, expand vote-by-mail, and fight back against voter suppression in all of its insidious forms. 
https://www.nytimes.com/2020/05/05/magazine/voting-by-mail-2020-covid.html

Over 11 months ago,I offered bill requiring all foreign companies,including from #CHINA,to provide audit information if they are listed on U.S. stock exchange

We still need this law

But happy to see @POTUS is looking at executive action on this as well https://www.wsj.com/articles/you-cant-trust-a-chinese-audit-11559687739

RT @SergioGor On point @RandPaul: “I fear some people who don’t want to investigate Obama are the same people, @LindseyGrahamSC, who don’t want #FISA reform cause they love the power of the intelligence community to snoop on anyone, including Americans.” #whereislindsey https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Dlv-qi29TCo&feature=youtu.be

Much more work needs to be done to reform #FISA and protect Americans from the FBI and DOJ’s abuses of power, but @SenMikeLee and @SenatorLeahy’s amendment to the USA FREEDOM Reauthorization Act, an amendment I cosponsored, is a strong step in the right direction.

Child care workers, often women of color, risk their health to care for essential workers' kids. They were already struggling before COVID-19. Congress must act on my $50B plan with @SenTinaSmith to keep child care from collapsing & fix our broken system. https://www.realclearpolicy.com/articles/2020/05/12/the_forgotten_essential_workers_women_of_color_in_child_care_491313.html

It requires layers of review, the blessing of a judge, and consideration of severe reputational harm to a sitting US Senator. https://twitter.com/yashar/status/1260751783682441216 QT @yashar News: The FBI served a warrant on Senator a Richard Burr tonight and seized his cell phone https://www.latimes.com/politics/story/2020-05-13/fbi-serves-warrant-on-senator-stock-investigation

RT @texasdemocrats Only took @JohnCornyn voting to repeal Affordable Care 20 times before he’s finally come around. 

Now Senator, where do you stand on your ally, indicted Attorney General Ken Paxton’s lawsuit that’s would repeal the Affordable Care Act for the millions of Texans that rely on it? https://twitter.com/teampelosi/status/1261084311798808582 QT @TeamPelosi 📺WATCH📺 Republican Sen. Cornyn encourages people to sign up for the Affordable Care Act!

After years of sabotage, it's time for Republicans to support the special enrollment period, drop their reckless ACA lawsuit that threatens our health care and expand Medicaid. http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1261083313663553537/pu/img/eizbT9dFwSM-p0RO.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1261083313663553537/pu/vid/480x270/XzwxURnH9w5ii-Zv.mp4?tag=10
I will be speaking with reporters live at the U.S. Capitol today at 3:00 pm ET. https://www.facebook.com/NancyPelosi

Let me thank Speaker Pelosi for recognizing the enormity of the coronavirus crisis and coming up with a number of important proposals.

In my view, the Senate must improve this bill to adequately address two urgent needs: health care and economic security. https://www.sanders.senate.gov/newsroom/press-releases/sanders-responds-to-house-democrats-new-coronavirus-legislation

36.5 million people have filed for unemployment in the last two months. 36.5 million. Americans are hurting and need help.

I'm proposing $2,000 monthly payments to help get people through this crisis.

Iran has lied and hidden its nuclear weapons program for years, including throughout the catastrophic Obama-Iran Nuclear Deal. It's time for POTUS to trigger the UN snapback sanctions and tear up the deal once and for all, and I applaud his moves in that direction. https://twitter.com/WSJopinion/status/1260739925533736962 QT @WSJopinion The U.N. Security Council must extend the arms embargo against Iran. If it won’t, the U.S. is prepared to ‘snap back’ sanctions, writes Brian H. Hook, U.S. special representative for Iran https://trib.al/tQ3fcb3

Finally, I believe the Senate must substantially expand direct emergency payments to working families. In my view, one additional $1,200 check is not enough. The Senate must provide a $2,000 per month emergency payment for every American until this crisis is over.
And, I for one, will oppose its reauthorization.

RT @NEAToday There's still time to join tonight's tele-town hall w/@KamalaHarris, @JahanaHayesCT, @Lily_NEA, & @BradleyWhitford where we'll cover what steps we need to take to ensure our students, educators, and communities rise together from #COVID19 

Register here👇🏽
https://www.mobilize.us/nea/event/272459/?utm_medium=twitter&utm_campaign=covid19

RT @RepRoKhanna The incompetence of this administration is not only disturbing, but deadly. 

@SenSanders and I introduced legislation to put more funding toward the DPA. We should be using every power at our disposal, not firing leaders on a political whim. https://twitter.com/cnnpolitics/status/1260994810493767680 QT @CNNPolitics JUST IN: The Pentagon has removed its lead official responsible for executing the Defense Production Act to increase the manufacturing of key equipment to combat the coronavirus pandemic https://trib.al/oW9CI34 http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EX_0GOFWAAUqQxN.jpg

We must have answers.

We must have justice.

The Department of Justice must investigate this incident and the use of force that led to Breonna Taylor’s horrifying death. https://abcnews.go.com/US/breonna-taylor-kentucky-emt-allegedly-killed-police-executing/story?id=70657850&cid=social_twitter_abcn

RT @jackhunter74 "As far as people crying about @RandPaul 'attacking' Fauci, this just isn't true. He did what a lot of these Twitter celebrities don't know how to do: Respectfully raised points of debate & questioned others' views without showing bad faith." @brad_polumbo https://www.washingtonexaminer.com/opinion/rand-paul-clashes-with-dr-fauci-over-reasonable-call-to-reopen-schools

Here's unfettered capitalism at work. Jeff Bezos, the owner of Amazon, has increased his wealth by $30 billion during the pandemic. His response: end the hazard pay increases that Amazon warehouse workers have received, despite hundreds of them being infected with the virus.

The Patriot Act was begotten of the most unpatriotic of ideas – that liberty can be exchanged for security.

The history of the Patriot Act shows that the exchange is a poor one.  As our liberty wanes and wastes away, we find that the promises of security were an illusion.

A national contact tracing program to let people know when they’ve interacted with someone with COVID-19 is key to stopping this virus & restarting our economy.

Read my op-ed with @RepAndyLevin on the bill we're introducing to stand up this program. https://www.nbcnews.com/think/opinion/coronavirus-contact-tracing-could-stop-covid-19-reopen-america-we-ncna1206701

In a stressful and difficult time for so many, it’s acts of kindness, decency and love that inspire the hope we need to get through this together. So grateful for the humble heroes in our state going out of their way to help others. #JerseyStrong https://www.northjersey.com/story/news/bergen/teaneck/2020/04/30/coronavirus-restaurant-retired-cop-team-up-feed-hospital-workers/3039907001/
See how your state and your community benefit from investments in state and local governments under this legislation: https://www.speaker.gov/heroesact

@JonahDispatch Hey there! Totally get it if you’ve never bothered to read the legislation you’re commenting so authoritatively on.

The Green New Deal is a non-binding resolution of values. It does not have a price tag or CBO score and costs us $0 if passed.

Read:
https://www.congress.gov/bill/116th-congress/house-resolution/109/amendments

This pandemic won't be over by November and we must take steps so Americans can safely exercise their right to vote. My VoteSafe Act would authorize $5 billion to:

-Expand vote-by-mail
-Require universal early voting
-Ensure in-person voting is still safe and accessible

Senator Rubio’s office has worked throughout the pandemic to bring home thousands of Floridians stranded abroad due to the #coronavirus.

We need a Judiciary Committee hearing on the spread of COVID-19 in our prisons.

I raised the alarm in March that the Justice Department and Bureau of Prisons needed to prepare for COVID-19. They did not do that. And it's on us to hold Bill Barr’s DOJ accountable.

We can’t rebuild our economy without first stopping the spread of COVID-19. House Democrats have already included pieces of Rep. @Andy_Levin and my national contact tracing plan in their proposed relief package—and Congress should do more. 
https://www.nbcnews.com/think/opinion/coronavirus-contact-tracing-could-stop-covid-19-reopen-america-we-ncna1206701

Absolutely shameful the Wisconsin Supreme Court put politics above public health.

Last month, @RoKhanna and I called for an Essential Workers Bill of Rights to guarantee basic protections for workers on the front lines.

Thanks to your grassroots support, we’ve secured many of these key measures in the HEROES Act—and we won’t stop fighting until it’s law. https://twitter.com/iSheyman/status/1260978708833357830 QT @iSheyman A massive thank you to @ewarren and @RoKhanna for your leadership on Essential Workers as one of the many wins in this proposal: #ProtectEssentialWorkers https://twitter.com/RoKhanna/status/1260966454133915652 http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EX_lYVvX0AEf3xj.jpg

RT @ewarren We can’t allow companies to use this crisis to boost their profits and consolidate their power while crushing workers who are already struggling to make ends meet. 

Rep. @AOC and I are calling for a moratorium on big mergers and Congress should pass it. 
https://www.theverge.com/2020/5/12/21255936/uber-grubhub-offer-buying-all-stock-delivery-service-eats-meals-merger

This is shameful. The federal govt must do more for struggling small businesses – especially in communities of color. I’ve called for the reporting of PPP demographic data to ensure these funds are going to the businesses & communities that need them. https://www.wbur.org/bostonomix/2020/05/12/small-businesses-chelsea-east-boston-coronavirus-ppp

Um, you were part of an Admin that abused law enforcement to target your political opponent & also ran an “Iran Echo Chamber,” conspiring with media & Dem campaigns to give $150 Bn to the leading state-sponsor of terrorism. https://www.bloomberg.com/opinion/articles/2016-05-24/the-secret-history-of-the-iran-deal-echo-chamber https://twitter.com/johnbrennan/status/1260901611527905280 QT @JohnBrennan .@realDonaldTrump’s propaganda & disinformation machine, which operates according to a despot’s playbook, is the most aggressive & odious in history. It far surpasses even Russia’s ability to trample the truth, harm U.S. security, & undermine America’s reputation worldwide.
It is high time we quit letting fear overrun our Constitutional duty.

I'm on the senate floor to discuss the Patriot Act and my amendment that restores the constitution for all Americans and forbids the secret FISA court from ever again meddling in our political process. Watch here: https://www.c-span.org/congress/?chamber=senate
